name: In Vitra (itch)
description:
In Vitra is a fantastic role-playing game with a turn-based combat system. It will lure you into the mysterious world of Vitra. After years of relentless battles against horrible monsters, finally, peace seems to return to Vitra - when suddenly a strange illness spreads throughout the land. Four courageous friends resolve to embark on a quest for the source of the disease and its cure - and chance upon an even bigger mystery.

Join our four heroes – young Noa and his best friend Luke, the pharmacist's daughter Lee-Belle and young priestess Billa - on their adventurous journey deep into the lush green lands of Vitra. Discover a fantastic world full of monsters and mysteries. Find out more about Vitra's dark past and reveal the well-kept secret of the dangerous affliction.

Features:

  • Enjoy hours of pure JRPG fun
  • Immerse yourself in an exciting fantasy story full of surprises
  • Embark on a dangerous journey and solve the mystery of Vitra
  • Learn countless spells and skills including a tier system
  • Test your mettle with the challenging turn-based combat system

Minimum system requirements:

  • OS: Windows7/8/10 (32/64bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo processor or AMD Athlon™ 64
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphics 4400 or more, Radeon HD graphics 5430 or more, OpenGL 3.0 or more
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
